definition: nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: They will be two games of high stress, very beautiful and competitive.
sentences.chinese: 那將是高度緊張的兩場比賽，可觀性和競技性俱佳。

sentences.english: Female bodybuilding is the female component of competitive bodybuilding.
sentences.chinese: 女子健美是競技性健美運動的一部分。

sentences.english: Track and field sports have dual features of competition and body building.
sentences.chinese: 田徑運動具有競技性和健身性雙重屬性。

sentences.english: Rowing is also a kind of competitive game.
sentences.chinese: 划艇也是一項競技性比賽。

sentences.english: Moreover, analyze the skill style characteristic of the rhythmic sportive gymnastics.
sentences.chinese: 再次，分析競技性藝術體操的技術風格特徵。

sentences.english: Competitive sports encourage children to work together as a team.
sentences.chinese: 競技性運動能加強孩子們的團隊凝聚力。

definition: rigorous schemes and deep foresight (idiom); astute and circumspect
highest common factor HCF/greatest common divisor GCD
bad money drives out good money (economics)
pinyin: lie4 bi4 qu1 zhu2 liang2 bi4
